short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple extension to track your spent time procrastinating.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension serves as a productivity tool designed to help users manage and measure their time spent procrastinating while browsing. The extension allows users to select specific tabs where it will be active, enabling targeted tracking of procrastination behavior on chosen websites. Users can also customize notification settings by setting specific time intervals for receiving reminders.

- How to Use the Extension:

- Users can input URLs of specific websites they want to track for procrastination.
       The "Add" button allows users to add the selected URL to the extension for tracking.

- Time Management:
      Users can set the desired time interval for procrastination tracking.
      The "-" and "+" buttons adjust the time interval, and the selected time is displayed.

- Save Preferences:
       Users can save their preferences by clicking the "Save" button.
       This action stores the selected URL, time interval, and other preferences.
- Procrastination Tracking:
       The extension actively tracks procrastination time on the selected websites.
        Notifications are sent to users based on the predefined time intervals.

Summary:
This extension provides a user-friendly interface for individuals seeking to monitor and control their procrastination habits. By allowing customization of tracked websites and notification timings, users can tailor the extension to their specific needs. The goal is to empower users to enhance their online productivity by promoting awareness and accountability in managing their time spent on distracting websites.
